title: Lynda - Decision-Making Fundamentals with Mike Figliuolo
description:
Lynda - Decision-Making Fundamentals with Mike Figliuolo 

Subject:  Business 

47m 56s Appropriate for all Feb 19, 2015 | Uploaded in Feb 28, 2015 by 2boweb


 
Learn the art and science of business decision-making from leadership trainer and coach Mike Figliuolo. Mike outlines the four styles of decision makingÃ¢â‚¬â€autocratic, participatory, democratic, and consensualÃ¢â‚¬â€and reveals which styles are best suited for specific situations. Recognizing that ambiguity is a part of any decision-making process, Mike covers the four types of ambiguity you'll face so that you can recognize what you don't know in order to reduce risk and plan for contingencies. He also presents techniques for involving stakeholders in the decision-making process, and explains how to use a RACI (responsible, accountable, consulted, and informed) matrix. Applying these major concepts will help you make better decisions faster, incur less risk, and gain more support for your decisions.

Topics include:

	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Communicating and executing decisions
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Measuring the results of decisions
